short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easiest way to remove boring content from YouTube videos. Great for listening to music.
short.ru: Самый простой способ удалить скучный контент из видео. Подходит для любителей музыки.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Important: reload YouTube tabs after installation (only once).

Key features:
    ✓ Interactive panel: just click buttons.
    ✓ Community-based segmentation: more than 15000 videos already segmented!
    ✓ Dozen of settings: hotkeys, filters, color schemes, and much more.
    ✓ Open source: everyone can contribute.

This extension will give you ability to easily remove:
    - Talking from music clips.
    - Annoying content.
    - Intros, outros.
    - Everything else you dont like.
	
Changelog: 
	- Full: https://github.com/videosegments/videosegments/commits/master
long.ru:
With this extension you can easily remove:
- talking from music;
- annoying cutscenes, intros, outros;
- anything else you don't like.

To make hard manual job easier, we implemented few tricks to make it easier:
- community-based database: some videos is already segmented (and passed manual review, so do not afraid to skip something important)!
- interactive panel: just click buttons.
- channel-based filtration: apply constant skip from start and from end of every video based on channel.
- smart cursor mode: adjust time using keyboard arrows only.
- silence filtration: extension will automatically remove silence on encounter.

Extension use community-based database of boring content (such as talking in music, intros, cutscenes, etc). Evety time you open video which exists in database, you will automatically skip boring content (you can always override community-based segmentation). Also you can share your segmentation and after it pass automatic and manual review, everyone will see it.
